text:
I am trying to run the examples bundled with Tomcat. So far, I have been unable 
to. All the included JSP do not proceed pass compilation. An exception is being 
thrown fro JspReader.java when the method getResourceAsStream is invoked on 
JspCompilationContext objetc. Eyeballing the source code shows that the method 
is maybe getting invoked on an interface for which there is no implemention. 
Here is the stack trace of the exception :

 JspReader: Exception parsing file /jsp/num/numguess.jsp -
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: javax.servlet.ServletContext: method getResourceAsS
tream(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/io/InputStream; not found
        at
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspReader.pushFile(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspReader.pushFile(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspReader.<init>(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspReader.createJspReader(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.doLoadJSP(Compiled Code)
creator: jeandd123@aol.com
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
The sample applications run fine in 3.2.1.  This is probably a classpath or 
some other configuration problem.
